Key Match Events: McCollum buried a 3 in the fourth to push the lead back to 10 points and put the finishing touches on the win with a 12-foot step back jumper.
Pre-Game Insights: Williamson was suspended for one game for a violation of team policies, that included repeated lateness to practices or flights.
The Pelicans also played without forward and top defensive player Herb Jones. Jones is sidelined indefinitely with a posterior labrum tear in his right shoulder.
Joel Embiid missed his third straight game because of a sprained left foot. He has sat out 23 times this season.
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans: Snapped a two-game losing streak and won for only the third time since Dec 7.
76ers: Yes, the 76ers are Embiid's team but it's been startling how bad they are without him in the lineup. The Sixers are just 8-15 when he doesn't play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul George had 25 points and 11 rebounds for the Sixers.
Tyrese Maxey had 30 points and 12 assists.
